mapper.select: SELECT schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time, status FROM SCHEDULE WHERE schedule_end_time >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT TO_CHAR(S.schedule_start_time, 'HH24:MI') || '~' || TO_CHAR(S.schedule_end_time, 'HH24:MI') AS "time", M.member_name AS "doctorName", DEPT.department_location AS "location" FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN STAFF ST ON S.staff_no = ST.staff_no JOIN DOCTOR D ON ST.staff_no = D.staff_no JOIN MEMBER M ON ST.member_no = M.member_no JOIN DEPARTMENT DEPT ON D.department_no = DEPT.department_no WHERE D.department_no = #{departmentId} AND S.status = '근무 중' AND TRUNC(S.schedule_start_time) = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY S.schedule_start_time
SELECT DISTINCT D.department_no AS "departmentNo", D.department_name AS "departmentName" FROM DEPARTMENT D JOIN DOCTOR DR ON D.department_no = DR.department_no ORDER BY D.department_no
